summary: AN ORDINANCE adopting a system or plan of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system of The City of Seattle; declaring the estimated cost thereof; authorizing the issuance and sale of municipal light and power revenue bonds in the principal amount of not to exceed $25,000,000 for the purpose of providing funds for such additions and betterments; providing for the terms, conditions, covenants, security and manner of sale of the bonds; and describing the lien of the bonds relative to the lien of the outstanding bonds issued pursuant to Ordinance 92938, Ordinance 96510, Ordinance 100540, Ordinance 101786, Ordinance 103208, Ordinance 105332, Ordinance 106513, Ordinance 109629, Ordinance 110844, Ordinance 112384, Ordinance 112809 and Ordinance 113859.
